US BANK HOLIDAY: June 19, 2024 – Incoming and outgoing USD payments paused
Bitstamp incoming and outgoing USD payments paused on Wednesday, June 19, 2024, due to a public holiday in the US.

Due to the upcoming public holiday (Juneteenth) in the US on Wednesday, June 19, 2024, Bitstamp’s bank payment clearing system for incoming and outgoing USD payments will not be available.

EUR SEPA transfers, GBP FPS transfers, credit card, Google Pay, Apple Pay, and PayPal transfers will remain unaffected.

If you need any help or additional information, please contact us at support@bitstamp.net.

We wish a happy Juneteenth to all our US customers!
US Holiday notice - Bitstamp incoming & outgoing USD payments June 19
